Terre_Haute.Twelve Points, Indiana:
Twelve Points is an unincorporated community in southern Harrison Township, Vigo County, in the U.S. state of Indiana.
Now within the city boundaries of Terre Haute, it is part of the Terre Haute metropolitan area.


== History ==
A post office was established at Twelve Points in 1916, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1979.
